data.text: a person who puts on a false appearance of virtue or religion
examples: … there are the hypocrites, who hurry to church on Sunday, but exhibit a whole spectrum of sins during the week.
The genuine hypocrite does or says one thing in public and another in private.

data.text: a person whose behavior contradicts their stated beliefs or feelings
examples: … there are the hypocrites, who hurry to church on Sunday, but exhibit a whole spectrum of sins during the week.
The genuine hypocrite does or says one thing in public and another in private.
